channel.title: Ine on ifconfig.it
channel.description: Recent content in Ine on ifconfig.it

item.title: INE CCIE R&S bootcamp – 2nd week
item.description: After the first week of the INE bootcamp I spent the weekend relaxing a bit and reviewing the topics on the doc-cd. The second week confimed the high level of this training, long hours and Brian Dennis showing us a lot of scenarios and how to spot a problem before it happens instead of just troubleshooting it later. My favorite days were MPLS and Multicast, followed by redistribution and OeR but I must say that I found in every single day something new.
